CustomField.description: The user has permission to edit Content, Attachment, and Document (V-2.4). This field is used for XfileAttach Component to edit files created in GDrive.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The user has permission to edit Content, Attachment, and Document (V-2.4). This field is used for XfileAttach Component to edit files created in GDrive.(V-3.5)
CustomField.label: Can Edit Data
